name: FlipFlip (Donitz)
description:
This game is played using the mouse. You start the game by moving the mouse cursor across the wavy center line. By moving the cursor back across the center line you flip the color of the surrounded section.

Your task in FlipFlip is to survive as long as possible against an infinite barrage of mines. Mines are destroyed by flipping the color under them.

Sound effects created using as3sfxr.

Hope you like the game!
